channel.title: [SFM] Morphogenetic Mafia [Full]
channel.description:
## Welcome to Morphogenetic Mafia!
### Hosted by @Mistyx and @Arete
### Rules
follow the HECKIN forum rules or perish
https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/official-forum-mafia-and-forum-of-lies-rules/78926 https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/global-forum-discord-game-meta-rules-please-read-first/244
### Gameplay Days will be 36 IRL hours long, or shorter if someone gets yeeted Nights will be 12 IRL hours long Actions are done via classcard Mafia will talk through a special Discord server This game will feature a unique mechanic where there are two private threads. Players on either thread will not be allowed to view the other thread. The only communication between threads will be partner and mafia chats. Partners will be able to discuss in their classcard, as they share a role. Pairs will not flip until both players are dead. Unless stated otherwise, pairs will share one action. Unless stated otherwise, players who are carrying their pair's action will not be able to target players on other threads. The mafia factional kill is mandatory, and will be able to target players on both threads if all mafia on one thread are dead. Alts are not allowed. Flavor, should it exist, will not be alignment indicative. If you have any further questions, ask me in this thread, or your classcard if the game has started.
### Executions To vote someone, do **/vote [player]**. Each thread will have its own execution. All executions are by plurality. Majority will not be enabled at any point during the game. Executions are not mandatory.
### To Join To join, simply express interest in joining by saying something like "I want to join" or "/join" or "/in" or "sign me up, coach" or whatever you want
### Rolelist: Closed
Pairs: 1. Marluxion + Chloe 2. Trochilidae + Wazza 3. TrustworthyLiberal + KyoDaz 4. Sulit + Katze 5. Maple + Ephemeral 6. EliThePsycho + YouButWorse 7. Blizer + Marshal 8. min + GGhana 9. Nightingale + Vulgard
Backups: - DatBird - ATNoName - Whysper - an_gorta_pratai - ArcticXI - eevee
Spectators: - Jane (uninformed) - thepigeonnyc (informed) - astand (informed) - Shurian (uninformed)

item.title: [SFM] Morphogenetic Mafia [Full]
item.dc:creator: Arete
item.description:
Announcement: Paraphrasing

While paraphrasing messages from partner chats is allowed, as is paraphrasing messages from the main thread to partner threads, attempting to angleshoot by paraphrasing your entire communications with your partner (or encouraging other players to do so) is banned.

Illustrative examples

Example 1: Allowed

Arete: ‘Hey Jane, can you ask your partner Shurian in Thread B what they think of Astand’
Jane: ‘Sure. I asked Shurian, and he says he thinks Astand is town because he posted a joycat.’

Example 2: Allowed

Arete: ‘Hey Mist, I think we should nightkill Shurian tonight. He keeps talking about the musical artist Prince, so I think he might be softing.’

Example 3: Not allowed

Arete: ‘Hey Jane, can you ask your partner Shurian in Thread B what they think of Astand?’
Jane: ‘Sure.’
Jane: ‘Shurian 1m: Tell Arete that I think Astand is probably town for posting a joycat.’

Example 4: Not allowed

Arete: ‘Hey Mist, I think we should nightkill Astand. Over in the other thread, he said “I am hardclaiming a strong PR and never rescinding.”’

Example 5: Not allowed

Completed: Marblelympics Team Mafia - Page 260

@Marluxion
@Chloe
@Trochilidae
@Wazza
